scripts.build: bun run generate && cd crates && cargo build && cd ../packages && bun install && bun run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf crates/target node_modules packages/node_modules packages/cli/node_modules packages/engine/node_modules packages/engine/src/gen
scripts.lint: bun run lint:types && bun run lint:ts && bun run lint:rust
scripts.lint:types: cd packages/engine && bunx tsc --noEmit && cd ../cli && bunx tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: bun run test:rust && bun run test:ts
scripts.test:ts: cd packages/cli && bun test && cd ../engine && bun test && cd ../.. && bun test tests/e2e/
